Sentencas: In this paper, we address the phenomenon of temporal, self-sustained oscillations which have been observed under quite general conditions in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: A fundamental model exhibiting nonlinear oscillatory dynamics in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our objective is to uncover the fundamental mechanisms giving rise to the observed oscillations.
Titulo: A fundamental model exhibiting nonlinear oscillatory dynamics in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To this end, we develop a model based on the fundamental chemical kinetics and transfer processes which take place within the fuel cell.
Titulo: A fundamental model exhibiting nonlinear oscillatory dynamics in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This leads to a three-dimensional dynamical system, which, under typical operating conditions, is rationally reducible to a planar dynamical system.
Titulo: A fundamental model exhibiting nonlinear oscillatory dynamics in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The structural dynamics of the planar dynamical system are studied in detail.
Titulo: A fundamental model exhibiting nonlinear oscillatory dynamics in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Self-sustained oscillations are shown to arise through Hopf bifurcations in this planar dynamical system, and the key parameter ranges for the occurrence of such oscillations are identified.
Titulo: A fundamental model exhibiting nonlinear oscillatory dynamics in solid oxide fuel cells
